weather.summary: Saturday: 7°C, light rain. Sunday: 10°C, overcast clouds

metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for some awesome adventures this weekend! We've got trains, diggers, and maybe even a dinosaur or two lined up just for you. Let's get muddy!

activities.title: DLR Ride to Mudchute Farm
activities.description: Take a fun ride on the DLR (sit at the front!) to Mudchute Farm, the biggest urban farm in Europe. See llamas, cows, sheep and more!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: DLR trains and farm animals - a perfect combo!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Mudchute, 30 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Animal Fun
activities.description: Visit Hackney City Farm to see pigs, goats, donkeys and chickens. There's also a cafe for a snack break.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Animals right on your doorstep!

transport.tip: Check out the pottery studio!

activities.title: Digging at Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park
activities.description: Explore the massive playgrounds at Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park. Tumbling Bay has sand and water for digging fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Get muddy playing in the sand and water!

transport.tip: Take a picnic!

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Visit the Young V&A for their under 5s play area and design workshops.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A great indoor space for playing and exploring.

transport.tip: Check out the design workshops for hands-on activities.

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Enjoy interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits at the Discover Children's Story Centre.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Lots of opportunities for imaginative play.

transport.tip: Check the schedule for character appearances.

activities.title: Victoria Park Playgrounds and Deer
activities.description: Victoria Park has two fantastic playgrounds to choose from! Plus, visit the deer enclosure to see some real animals.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Playgrounds and animals in one place!

transport.fromHackney: Walk or bus, depending on location, 10-20 mins
transport.tip: Take a picnic to enjoy by the boating lake.

activities.title: Paradise Wildlife Park's Dinosaur World
activities.description: Head to Paradise Wildlife Park for a Dinosaur World experience! They also have real animals and soft play.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Dinosaurs and animals!

transport.fromHackney: Train from Hackney Downs to Broxbourne, then a bus, 1 hour
transport.tip: Check the park's website for show times.

activities.title: Dinosaur Adventure at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: See the famous T-Rex skeleton and other amazing dinosaur exhibits. Don't miss the Blue Whale in Hintze Hall!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Dinosaurs, dinosaurs, dinosaurs!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.tip: Visit the Investigate Centre for hands-on activities.

activities.title: All Aboard at the London Transport Museum
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, try the tube simulator, and play in the All Aboard zone. Under 18s are FREE!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Trains and buses you can climb on!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Oxford Circus, then walk, 40 mins
transport.tube: Covent Garden or Leicester Sq tube
transport.tip: Collect stamps along the stamper trail.

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs and Playground
activities.description: See the Victorian dinosaur statues on the islands! Plus, there's a farm, maze, and a great playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Dinosaurs and a playground - what's not to love?

transport.tip: Pack a picnic to enjoy by the lake.

activities.title: Science Museum's The Garden
activities.description: The Garden is a special area for under 5s with lots of hands-on exhibits. Also check out the Flight gallery and Making the Modern World (trains!).
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Hands-on activities and trains!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.tip: Wonderlab is a paid exhibit but worth it for older children.

activities.title: National Maritime Museum's AHOY! Gallery
activities.description: Explore the ships gallery and play in the AHOY! children's gallery. There's also a great playground outside.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Ships and a playground!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Cutty Sark, 40 mins
transport.tip: Take the Thames Clipper from Tower Pier for a fun boat ride.

activities.title: RAF Museum London - Planes Galore!
activities.description: See a huge collection of aircraft in massive hangers. There's also a 4D cinema and outdoor playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Planes and helicopters!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Finsbury Park, then Piccadilly Line to Colindale, 45 mins
transport.tip: Check out the flight simulators.

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live!
activities.description: See Hey Duggee and the Squirrels live on stage! Earn badges and sing along to your favourite songs.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Hey Duggee is one of your favorite shows!

transport.tip: Book tickets early for best seats.

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Join Peppa Pig and her friends for a fun-filled show with singing and dancing.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You love Peppa Pig!

transport.tip: Bring your camera for a photo opportunity.

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: See life-size dinosaur puppets on stage! A thrilling and educational experience.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Life-size dinosaurs!

transport.tip: Be prepared for some loud roars!

activities.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
activities.description: See the classic story come to life on stage!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A fun and engaging show for young children.

transport.tip: Enjoy a cup of tea afterwards!

activities.title: Unicorn Theatre Shows
activities.description: Check the Unicorn Theatre's website for upcoming shows suitable for young children.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A dedicated kids theatre with a variety of performances.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then train to London Bridge, 30 mins
transport.tip: Book tickets in advance, especially for popular shows.

activities.title: Little Angel Theatre Puppetry
activities.description: Enjoy a magical puppetry performance at this intimate theatre.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Puppets are always fun!

transport.tip: Arrive early to explore the theatre.

activities.title: Half Moon Theatre Shows
activities.description: Check the Half Moon Theatre's website for upcoming shows for young children.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A theatre close to Hackney with shows for kids!

transport.tip: Check the age suitability of the show before booking.
